name: Re-Bot (Renx34)
description:
Cover Art by https://twitter.com/SuperMcTea/status/1572172130191822849

WARNING: REALLY LOUD (SORRY).

Created for MQ Game Jam - Theme Reboot.

Our game fits the theme by having the Player reboot constantly to traverse through the level. While the player is off, the environment will turn on and vice versa. Utilise the reboot mechanic and physics to finish the levels.

Controls

Use A and D to move left and right respectively. 

SPACEBAR to jump.

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON or LEFT CTRL to shift between power states.

Members of Twenty-Eighty-Nine

Brent - Creative Director,  Technical Artist, Level Designer

Luca - Music, SFX

Caleb - Programmer 1

Kabir - Programmer 2
